entry.title: Article list 已发表论文总结
entry.content:
第一作者论文汇总

  1. 李欣洋, 张遵真. 大气细颗粒物可通过长链非编码RNA途径促进肺癌细胞的迁移侵袭[J]. 环境卫生学杂志, 2017(05): 390.

  2. 李欣洋, 王晔. 邻苯二甲酸二(2-乙基己)酯中毒机制研究进展[J]. 医学综述, 2015(09):51-54.

  3. Li, X., Zuo, C., Wu, M., Zhang, Z.. Linc-ROR promotes arsenite-transformed keratinocyte proliferation by inhibiting P53 activity[J]. Metallomics, 2020,12(6): 963-973.

  4. Li, X., Sun, D., Zhao, T., Zhang, Z.. Long non-coding RNA ROR confers arsenic trioxide resistance to HepG2 cells by inhibiting p53 expression[J]. European journal of pharmacology, 2020,872: 172982.

  5. Li, X., Zuo, C., Sun, D., Zhao, T., Zhang, Z.. Arsenite Increases Linc-ROR in Human Bronchial Epithelial Cells that Can Be Inhibited by Antioxidant Factors[J]. Biological trace element research, 2020, 198, 131–141.

  6. Li, X., Gu, S., Sun, D., Dai, H., Chen, H., Zhang, Z.. The selectivity of artemisinin-based drugs on human lung normal and cancer cells[J]. Environmental toxicology and pharmacology, 2018,57: 86-94.

2020

中文

英文

  1. Li, X., Zuo, C., Wu, M., Zhang, Z.. Linc-ROR promotes arsenite-transformed keratinocyte proliferation by inhibiting P53 activity[J]. Metallomics, 2020,12(6): 963-973.

  2. Li, X., Sun, D., Zhao, T., Zhang, Z.. Long non-coding RNA ROR confers arsenic trioxide resistance to HepG2 cells by inhibiting p53 expression[J]. European journal of pharmacology, 2020,872: 172982.

  3. Li, X., Zuo, C., Sun, D., Zhao, T., Zhang, Z.. Arsenite Increases Linc-ROR in Human Bronchial Epithelial Cells that Can Be Inhibited by Antioxidant Factors[J]. Biological trace element research, 2020, 198, 131–141.

2019

中文

  1. 陈梦曦, 李欣洋, 代黄梅,等. 真空臭氧消毒机对新鲜果蔬杀菌效果的实验研究[J]. 中国消毒学杂志, 2019, 036(003):164-166.
  2. 陈梦曦, 李欣洋, 代黄梅,等. 臭氧消毒柜对不同材料表面消毒效果的研究[J]. 中国消毒学杂志, 2019, 036(005):329-331.
  3. 赵田禾, 李欣洋, 孙东雷,等. 亚砷酸钠诱导的活性氧增加人皮肤细胞N6-甲基腺苷水平[J]. 现代预防医学, 2019, 046(006):1074-1078.

英文

  1. Wp, A. , Shan, L. B. , Fh, A. , Xl, C. , Bs, A. , & Tz, A. , et al. (2019). Anticancer activities of zanthoxylum bungeanum seed oil on malignant melanoma. Journal of Ethnopharmacology, 229, 180-189.

  2. Donglei Sun, Tianhe Zhao, Xinyang Li & Zunzhen Zhang (2019) Evaluation of DNA and chromosomal damage in two human HaCaT and L02 cells treated with varying triclosan concentrations, Journal of Toxicology and Environmental Health, Part A, 82:7, 473-482.

  3. Zhao, T. , Li, X. , Sun, D. , & Zhang, Z. . (2019). Oxidative stress: one potential factor for arsenite-induced increase of n~6-methyladenosine in human keratinocytes. Environmental Toxicology & Pharmacology, 69, 95-103.

2018

中文

  1. 陈梦曦, 李欣洋, 代黄梅,等. 真空臭氧消毒机对饮品消毒效果的实验研究[J]. 中国消毒学杂志, 2018, 35(11):31-33.
  2. 陈梦曦, 李欣洋, 代黄梅,等. 真空臭氧消毒机对水果杀菌效果的实验研究[J]. 现代预防医学, 2018, 45(19):122-126.
  3. 陈梦曦, 吴媚, 李欣洋,等. 真空臭氧消毒机对微生物杀灭效果的实验研究[J]. 现代预防医学, 2018, 45(23):113-116.
  4. 代黄梅, 谷仕艳, 李欣洋,等. N6-甲基腺苷在三氧化二砷抑制肝癌细胞生长中的作用研究[J]. 现代预防医学, 2018, 045(008):1471-1474,1486.
  5. 赵田禾, 李欣洋, 孙东雷,等. 铁离子与铁死亡:衰老研究领域的新大陆[J]. 现代预防医学, 2018, 45(23):174-177.

英文

  1. Li, X., Gu, S., Sun, D., Dai, H., Chen, H., Zhang, Z.. The selectivity of artemisinin-based drugs on human lung normal and cancer cells[J]. Environmental toxicology and pharmacology, 2018,57: 86-94.

2017

中文

  1. 李欣洋, 张遵真. 大气细颗粒物可通过长链非编码RNA途径促进肺癌细胞的迁移侵袭[J]. 环境卫生学杂志, 2017(05): 390.
  2. 谷仕艳, 陈虹宇, 代黄梅,等. miR-155/BACH1信号通路在三氧化二砷诱导肺腺癌细胞死亡中的机制研究[J]. 四川大学学报(医学版), 2017, 48(006):828-833.

英文

  1. Chen, H., Gu, S., Dai, H. et al. Dihydroartemisinin Sensitizes Human Lung Adenocarcinoma A549 Cells to Arsenic Trioxide via Apoptosis. Biol Trace Elem Res 179, 203–212 (2017).
  2. Gu, S.; Sun, D.; Li, X.; Zhang, Z. Alterations of miRNAs and Their Potential Roles in Arsenite-Induced Transformation of Human Bronchial Epithelial Cells. Genes, 2017, 8, 254.
  3. Zhao, Tianhe et al. Large Intergenic Non-coding RNA-ROR as a Potential Biomarker for the Diagnosis and Dynamic Monitoring of Breast Cancer. 1 Jan. 2017 : 165 – 173.

2016及之前

中文

  1. 李欣洋, 王晔. 邻苯二甲酸二(2-乙基己)酯中毒机制研究进展[J]. 医学综述, 2015(09):51-54.

英文

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.
